mapper.select: SELECT user_info.USER_ID, ID, NAME, generated_date, authority_name FROM user_info INNER JOIN authority_rel ON user_info.user_id = authority_rel.user_id INNER JOIN authority ON authority_rel.authority_id = authority.authority_id;

SELECT user_info.USER_ID, ID, NAME, authority.authority_id , authority.authority_name FROM user_info INNER JOIN authority_rel ON user_info.user_id = authority_rel.user_id INNER JOIN authority ON authority_rel.authority_id = authority.authority_id WHERE user_info.user_id = #{USER_ID};

SELECT count(user_id) FROM user_info
where 1 = 1 and id like CONCAT('%',#{authority_id},'%')

SELECT * FROM( SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, user_info.user_id, user_info.id,user_info.generated_date, authority.authority_name FROM user_info INNER JOIN authority_rel ON user_info.user_id = authority_rel.user_id INNER JOIN authority ON authority_rel.authority_id = authority.authority_id ,( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R) A WHERE A.ROWNUM between #{pagination.pageBegin} and #{pagination.pageEnd}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, user_info.user_id, user_info.id,user_info.generated_date, authority.authority_name FROM user_info INNER JOIN authority_rel ON user_info.user_id = authority_rel.user_id INNER JOIN authority ON authority_rel.authority_id = authority.authority_id ,( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R
WHERE user_info.id like CONCAT('%',#{authority_id},'%') ) A WHERE A.ROWNUM between #{pagination.pageBegin} and #{pagination.pageEnd}
